snippet.title: Terrifier: The ARTcade Game - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Check out gameplay and features, like local multiplayer and more, from Terrifier: The ARTcade Game in this latest trailer for the upcoming retro beat 'em up game. Drawing inspiration from classic 80s and 90s fighting games, this gory adventure invites you to embody Art the Clown, the sinister and unpredictable villain from the Terrifier series. As Art, you'll wreak havoc across various movie sets where a film about him is being produced—your mission? To disrupt the show in style! Terrifier: The ARTcade Game will be available on PC (Steam), Nintendo Switch, PS5, and Xbox in 2025.
